Good Comments: Ridiculous filesize overkill in the name of preserving every bit of grain, noise, artifacting, cel scratches, etc. from the source. "15 GB of Macross, 13 GB of grain."
Bad Comments: Yeah like the other guy said the filesizes are ridiculous, but this release is MILES better than all the other ones (including White_Base) since it is ripped from the remastered DVDs. I am talking night and day here.
The subtitles are adequate and the video quality is much better than the White Base release.
